EmailTemplate.name: 2020_Greenhouse_IMUs_Ongoing-Lead-Dark_Nurture.Email 5: 15 minutes this week?
EmailTemplate.subject: 15 minutes this week?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Are you available for 15 minutes this week? I’d like to catch up to see if there’s anything I can do to help.
Let me know what time works best.
I look forward to hearing from you.
Best,{{lead.hGuide Sales Owner Full Name:default=Hguide Support}}
